title: 原本首批武肺疫苗係唔會防止傳播

replies.msg:
打咗變 asymptomatic.，到時未打個批含撚都得，通街帶病毒忠者

Australia's initial vaccine rollout unlikely to stop Covid transmission, study finds
https://www.theguardian.com/australia-news/2020/dec/15/vaccine-likely-to-prevent-covid-developing-but-not-stop-transmission

COVID-19 vaccines may not prevent spread of virus, so mask-wearing, other protections still critical
https://www.washington.edu/news/2020/12/02/covid-19-vaccines-may-not-prevent-spread-of-virus-so-mask-wearing-other-protections-still-critical/

Data from vaccine phase 3 clinical trials to date show the vaccines lessen or prevent the vaccinated person from developing disease, but not whether they stop the vaccinated person from transmitting the virus to others. Whether vaccines also stop transmission is unlikely to be known until they are rolled out to the general population.
on9仔讀多啲書先啦英文都唔識

quote.msg: Data from vaccine phase 3 clinical trials to date show the vaccines lessen or prevent the vaccinated person from developing disease, but not whether they stop the vaccinated person from transmitting the virus to others. Whether vaccines also stop transmission is unlikely to be known until they are rolled out to the general population.

replies.msg:
純粹話目前未知，句not whether係講緊data淨係講到有冇效，無講會唔會阻隔到打咗嘅人再帶病毒而傳畀人，而唔係not stopping the vaccinated person from transmitting to others

成日都有啲英文唔好嘅就專睇英文報導然後亂章取義做乜鳩
